sourceMeaningMnemonic: Under the <radical>canopy</radical>, you use a <radical>tree</radical> for your <kanji>floor</kanji>. It also becomes your <kanji>bed</kanji>, because hey, what is a floor but the original bed?
meaningInfo: You lay it down, cut it into slats, and voila! A floor! And a bed!
readingMnemonic: News of your amazing <kanji>floor</kanji> / <kanji>bed</kanji> spreads and reaches the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (<ja>しょう</ja>), who wants to come see it. He's impressed, and asks you to build floor beds out of trees lying under this canopy in all of his buildings.
readingInfo: This new floor + bed invention, along with your other accomplishments, have you being watched really closely by the Shougun now. He seems to be keeping an eye on you so he can swoop down and check out everything you do.
